SELECT USERID , USER_TASK_CD , PRGM_ID , UPPER_PRGM_ID , SORT_ORDER , PRGM_NM , PRGM_URI , PRGM_ICON , LEVEL FROM ( SELECT A.USERID , A.USER_TASK_CD , C.PRGM_ID , C.UPPER_PRGM_ID , C.SORT_ORDER , C.PRGM_NM , C.PRGM_URI , C.PRGM_ICON FROM LBUSERTASKAUTH A INNER JOIN LBUSERTASKPRGM B ON A.USER_TASK_CD = B.USER_TASK_CD INNER JOIN LBMNGPRGM C ON B.PRGM_ID = C.PRGM_ID
WHERE A.USERID = #{loginId} AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' ) START WITH UPPER_PRGM_ID IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR PRGM_ID = UPPER_PRGM_ID ORDER SIBLINGS BY SORT_ORDER
